lines.content: * Creates a .txt file to save tasks from Chatbot in the hard disk automatically
* Attempts to load existing backup file from given directory, else creates a new file
* Stores tasks from the chatbot in an ArrayList for easy retrieval
Task task = new Deadline("deadline " + tokens[2] + "/by " + tokens[3]);
Task task = new Event("event " + tokens[2] + "/at " + tokens[3]);
* Get number of tasks in current tasklist
* @return int value of size of tasklist
* Removes task from param index from tasklist
* Writes current state snapshot of tasklist into .txt file
* Starts the UI for the chatbot

public static final String MESSAGE = "Please add index to delete.";

public static final String MESSAGE = "Please add a description for ";
public static final String MESSAGE2 = " task.";
* RonException type: Index out of store
* Exception thrown when user inputs an index out of bounds of task list
public static final String MESSAGE = "Task index not found.";
public static final String MESSAGE = "Please input a valid index to delete.";
* Exception thrown when error occurs while loading backup file on start
public static final String MESSAGE = "No current tasks found, creating new task list.";
* Exception thrown when user input does not contain a date
public static final String MESSAGE = "Please add a date.";
* Exception thrown when user toggles mark/unmark to its original state
public static final String MARKED_MESSAGE = "Task is already marked.";
public static final String UNMARKED_MESSAGE = "Task is already unmarked.";
* Exception thrown when command is unidentified
public static final String MESSAGE = "Unable to find event defined, please try again.";
* Exception thrown when error occurs while saving backup file on exit
public static final String MESSAGE = "Error while saving backup.";
* Exception thrown when users input date without "/"
public static final String MESSAGE = "Please add prefix '/' to date.";
